
## Class : aorta endothelium

 * *IRI* = http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0004851
 * *Label* = aorta endothelium
 * *Definition* = An endothelium that is part of an aorta [Automatically generated definition]. [ [database_cross_reference](../../ef/oboInOwl#hasDbXref.md) = OBOL:automatic ]
